sqlMap.select:
SELECT R.* FROM ( SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(A PK_PCN_PREFORM_TICKET)*/ FLOOR((ROW_NUMBER()OVER( ORDER BY SEQ DESC nulls last)-1)/$list_unit$+1) AS PAGE ,SEQ ,TITLE ,UCI ,'/perform/performView.do?uci='||UCI URL ,(SELECT VENUE FROM PCN_RDF_METADATA WHERE UCI = A.UCI) PLACE ,TO_CHAR(START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD')||' ~ '||TO_CHAR(END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PERIOD ,DISCOUNT ,( SELECT NAME FROM PCN_RDF_METADATA B, PCN_COMMON_CODE C WHERE A.UCI = B.UCI AND C.PCODE = 127 AND C.VALUE = B.GENRE ) GENRE ,( SELECT CASE WHEN REFERENCE_IDENTIFIER_ORG IS NOT NULL THEN '/upload/rdf/' || REFERENCE_IDENTIFIER_ORG ELSE REFERENCE_IDENTIFIER END IMAGE FROM PCN_RDF_METADATA T WHERE A.UCI = T.UCI ) IMAGE FROM PCN_PREFORM_TICKET A WHERE APPROVAL = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(END_DT, 'yyyymmdd') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyymmdd')
( TITLE LIKE '%'|| #searchKeyword# || '%' OR DBMS_LOB.INSTR(CONTENT,#searchKeyword#) > 0 )
( START_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#reg_start#,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#reg_end#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') OR END_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#reg_start#,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#reg_end#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') )
) R WHERE R.PAGE = #page_no#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PCN_PREFORM_TICKET A WHERE APPROVAL = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(END_DT, 'yyyymmdd') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyymmdd')
( TITLE LIKE '%'|| #searchKeyword# || '%' OR DBMS_LOB.INSTR(CONTENT,#searchKeyword#) > 0 )
( START_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#reg_start#,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#reg_end#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') OR END_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#reg_start#,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#reg_end#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') )

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PCN_RECOM_CULTURE A, PORTAL_STORY_AUTHOR B WHERE A.APPROVAL = 'Y' AND A.CONT_TYPE = 'S' AND A.AUTHOR_SEQ = B.SEQ(+)
TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'

SELECT R.*, (SELECT SERVICE_NAME FROM WS_SERVICE_CATEGORY WHERE SERVICE_ID = A.SERVICE_ID) SERVICE_NAME, (SELECT AREA_NAME FROM WS_AREA_CATEGORY WHERE AREA_ID = A.AREA_ID) AREA_NAME, case when AREA_GROUP = '1' then '/mov/internationalView.do?idx='||IDX when CULTURE100 = 'Y' then '/mov/culture100View.do?idx='||IDX else '/mov/culturePdView.do?idx='||IDX end URL, case when length(MOVIE_PIC_PATH2_SYSNAME) > 0 then '/upload/contents/' || MOVIE_PIC_PATH2_SYSNAME when length((select name from tvm_thumbnail where cid = A.cid and delegate = 1)) > 0 then '/upload/videos2/vod/'|| (select uri from tvm_thumbnail where cid = A.cid and delegate = 1) || '/' || (select name from tvm_thumbnail where cid = A.cid and delegate = 1) else '/upload/videos2/vod/'|| (select uri from tvm_thumbnail where cid = A.cid and ncount = 1) || '/' || (select name from tvm_thumbnail where cid = A.cid and ncount = 1) end IMAGE FROM ( SELECT FLOOR((ROW_NUMBER()OVER( ORDER BY IDX DESC nulls last)-1)/$list_unit$+1) AS PAGE , IDX , TITLE , SERVICE_ID , AREA_ID , MOVIE_PIC_PATH2_SYSNAME , CONTENTS SUMMARY , CID , CULTURE100 , AREA_GROUP FROM COMS_MOVIE_REG WHERE STATE = '3'
AREA_GROUP = #area_group#
CULTURE100 = #culture100#
SERVICE_ID = #service_id#
AREA_ID = #area_id#
TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
) R WHERE R.PAGE = #page_no#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM COMS_MOVIE_REG WHERE STATE = '3'
AREA_GROUP = #area_group#
CULTURE100 = #culture100#
SERVICE_ID = #service_id#
AREA_ID = #area_id#
TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'

SELECT R.*, (SELECT SERVICE_NAME FROM WS_SERVICE_CATEGORY WHERE SERVICE_ID = A.SERVICE_ID) SERVICE_NAME, (SELECT AREA_NAME FROM WS_AREA_CATEGORY WHERE AREA_ID = A.AREA_ID) AREA_NAME, case when AREA_GROUP = '1' then '/mov/internationalView.do?idx='||IDX when CULTURE100 = 'Y' then '/mov/culture100View.do?idx='||IDX else '/mov/culturePdView.do?idx='||IDX end URL, case when length(MOVIE_PIC_PATH2_SYSNAME) > 0 then '/upload/contents/' || MOVIE_PIC_PATH2_SYSNAME when length((select name from tvm_thumbnail where cid = A.cid and delegate = 1)) > 0 then '/upload/videos2/vod/'|| (select uri from tvm_thumbnail where cid = A.cid and delegate = 1) || '/' || (select name from tvm_thumbnail where cid = A.cid and delegate = 1) else '/upload/videos2/vod/'|| (select uri from tvm_thumbnail where cid = A.cid and ncount = 1) || '/' || (select name from tvm_thumbnail where cid = A.cid and ncount = 1) end IMAGE FROM ( SELECT FLOOR((ROW_NUMBER()OVER( ORDER BY IDX DESC nulls last)-1)/$list_unit$+1) AS PAGE , IDX , TITLE , SERVICE_ID , AREA_ID , MOVIE_PIC_PATH2_SYSNAME , CONTENTS SUMMARY , CID , CULTURE100 , AREA_GROUP FROM COMS_MOVIE_REG WHERE 1=1
AREA_GROUP = #area_group#
CULTURE100 = #culture100#
SERVICE_ID = #service_id#
AREA_ID = #area_id#
TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
) R WHERE R.PAGE = #page_no#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM COMS_MOVIE_REG WHERE 1=1 AND SYSDATE >= WISH_POST_DATE
AREA_GROUP = #area_group#
CULTURE100 = #culture100#
SERVICE_ID = #service_id#
AREA_ID = #area_id#
TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM VLI_VLI_CUL WHERE POST_FLAG = 'Y'
CUL_NAME LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PCN_GROUP_CULTURE A WHERE APPROVAL = 'Y'
( NAME like '%'|| #searchKeyword# || '%' or DBMS_LOB.INSTR(CONTENT,#searchKeyword#) > 0 )

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM MV_RDF_METADATA_RELIC WHERE NVL(APPROVAL, 'Y') = 'Y' AND REFERENCE_IDENTIFIER IS NOT NULL AND PUBLISHER != 'KCIC08'
TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM NUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT URL, TITLE, TYPE, REG_DATE ,UCI, REFERENCE_IDENTIFIER AS IMAGE, REG_DATE AS CONT_DATE, CREATOR AS RIGHTS FROM MV_RDF_METADATA_ICT A WHERE NVL(APPROVAL, 'Y') = 'Y' AND REFERENCE_IDENTIFIER IS NOT NULL
TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC NULLS LAST ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #enum# ) WHERE NUM >= #snum#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM MV_RDF_METADATA_ICT WHERE NVL(APPROVAL, 'Y') = 'Y' AND REFERENCE_IDENTIFIER IS NOT NULL
TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM NUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT SEQ , TITLE , REG_DATE CONT_DATE , COMPANY RIGHTS , CASE WHEN URL IS NULL THEN '/news/noticeView.do?seq=' || SEQ ELSE URL END URL FROM CL_TOTAL_NEWS A WHERE CONFIRM_YN = 'Y' AND IS_DELETE = 'N' AND CATEGORY = '5'
TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC NULLS LAST ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #enum# ) WHERE NUM >= #snum#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CL_TOTAL_NEWS WHERE CONFIRM_YN = 'Y' AND IS_DELETE = 'N' AND CATEGORY = '5'
TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'

SELECT URL , TITLE , TYPE , UCI , REG_DATE CONT_DATE , CREATOR RIGHTS FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM NUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(A IDX_RDF_METADATA_04)*/ URL , TITLE , TYPE , REG_DATE , UCI , CREATOR FROM MV_RDF_METADATA_INFO A WHERE REG_DATE IS NOT NULL AND REG_DATE < SYSDATE AND
#type[]#
AND NVL(APPROVAL, 'Y') = 'Y'
( TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR CREATOR LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR DBMS_LOB.INSTR(DESCRIPTION,#searchKeyword#) > 0 )
UNION ALL SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(A PCN_INFO_BOARD_IDX01)*/ URL , TITLE , TYPE , REG_DATE , UCI , CREATOR FROM PCN_INFO_BOARD A WHERE REG_DATE IS NOT NULL AND
#type[]#
AND NVL(APPROVAL, 'Y') = 'Y'
( TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR CREATOR LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR DBMS_LOB.INSTR(DESCRIPTION,#searchKeyword#) > 0 )
) A ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #enum# ) WHERE NUM >= #snum#

SELECT SUM(CNT) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1) CNT FROM MV_RDF_METADATA_INFO WHERE
#type[]#
AND REG_DATE IS NOT NULL AND REG_DATE < SYSDATE AND NVL(APPROVAL, 'Y') = 'Y'
( TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR CREATOR LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR DBMS_LOB.INSTR(DESCRIPTION,#searchKeyword#) > 0 )
UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(1) CNT FROM PCN_INFO_BOARD WHERE
#type[]#
AND NVL(APPROVAL, 'Y') = 'Y'
( TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR CREATOR LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR DBMS_LOB.INSTR(DESCRIPTION,#searchKeyword#) > 0 )
)A

SELECT R.* FROM ( SELECT FLOOR((ROW_NUMBER()OVER( ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC nulls last)-1)/$list_unit$ + 1) AS PAGE , A.* FROM ( SELECT TITLE ,CREATOR ,REG_DATE ,REFERENCE_IDENTIFIER ,UCI ,URL FROM MV_RDF_METADATA_INFO WHERE TYPE LIKE #type# || '%'
AND REG_DATE IS NOT NULL
TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
UNION ALL SELECT TITLE ,CREATOR ,REG_DATE ,REFERENCE_IDENTIFIER ,UCI ,URL FROM PCN_INFO_BOARD WHERE TYPE LIKE #type# || '%' AND APPROVAL = 'Y'
TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
) A ) R WHERE R.PAGE = #page_no#

SELECT SUM(A.CNT) COUNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1) CNT FROM MV_RDF_METADATA_INFO WHERE TYPE LIKE #type# || '%'
AND REG_DATE IS NOT NULL
TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(1) CNT FROM PCN_INFO_BOARD WHERE TYPE LIKE #type# || '%' AND APPROVAL = 'Y'
TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
) A

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CL_TOTAL_NEWS WHERE CONTENT_TYPE = 2
TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT R.* FROM ( SELECT FLOOR((ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY SEQ DESC nulls last)-1)/$list_unit$ + 1) AS PAGE , SEQ , MENU_CD , TITLE , (SELECT VALUE FROM PCN_COMMON_CODE C WHERE C.CODE = A.CODE) SUB_TITLE , THUMB_URL , CODE_TYPE , CODE , CONTENT , ORIGIN , REG_DATE , USER_ID FROM PORTAL_STORY A WHERE MENU_CD = 1 AND APPROVAL = 'Y'
REG_DATE BETWEEN #reg_start# AND #reg_end#
TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
CODE = #code#
) R WHERE R.PAGE = #page_no#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PORTAL_STORY WHERE MENU_CD = 1 AND APPROVAL = 'Y'
REG_DATE BETWEEN #reg_start# AND #reg_end#
TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
CODE = #code#
SELECT CTYPENAME AS NAME , CTYPE AS VALUE FROM PORTAL_TOUR GROUP BY CTYPENAME , CTYPE

SELECT R.* FROM ( SELECT FLOOR((ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY PCN_BNO DESC nulls last)-1)/$list_unit$ + 1) AS PAGE , PCN_BNO , TITLE , SERVICEURL AS URL , TO_DATE(CREDT , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DATE , IMGURL , CTYPE , CTYPENAME AS CATEGORY , CADDR , XPTEL , CREDT FROM PORTAL_TOUR
CTYPE = #ctype#
TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
) R WHERE R.PAGE = #page_no#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PORTAL_TOUR
CTYPE = #ctype#
TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT R.* FROM ( SELECT FLOOR((ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY PCN_BNO DESC nulls last)-1)/$list_unit$ + 1) AS PAGE , SEQ , TITLE , UCI , REG_DATE , RIGHTS , PERIOD , '/edu/educationView.do?seq=' || seq AS URL FROM PORTAL_EDUCATION
CTYPE = #ctype#
TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
) R WHERE R.PAGE = #page_no#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PORTAL_EDUCATION
CTYPE = #ctype#
TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PCN_PATTERN_DESIGN A WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #search_word# || '%'

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PCN_PATTERN_GALLERY A WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #search_word# || '%'

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PORTAL_CULTURE_SUPPORT WHERE 1=1 AND ( SYSDATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(APPLY_START_DT, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(APPLY_END_DT, 'yyyy-mm-dd') OR TO_DATE(APPLY_START_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') > SYSDATE) AND APPROVAL = 'Y'
( TITLE LIKE '%'|| #searchKeyword# ||'%' OR NOTICE LIKE '%'|| #searchKeyword# ||'%' )
